name: Dracumon
description: Dracmon is a vampire/imp themed pale-skinned Digimon who wears a black mask with red and green eye markings on it that doesn't cover its mouth, exposing its huge grin. Embedded in its palms are a set of eyeballs whose irises match the eye markings. Though it has wings, they are connected by a gold trinket and rest around its waist along with a long, skinny tail. Its fingers are tipped with long, red claws and it has three claws sticking out of the front of its shoes.
